name: Zombie's Got a Pogo
description:
*** TOP 10 game in 90 countries! ***
*** TOP 5 action game in 96 countries! ***

What the heck, Zombie’s got a pogo? Try to keep your head intact and keep on moving through numerous obstacles, pitfalls and all sorts of trouble as you try to reach farther than other zombies. Follow the trail of brains and tune up your zombie!

Zombie's Got a Pogo is an award winning game from the creators of Zombie High Dive.

Zombie's Got a Pogo features:

• Randomly generated endless world and deadly pitfalls.
• Bone breaking crashes and nerve-shredding pogo action.
• Physics rules making every situation unique and funny.
• Pick up and play. No brains required!
• The farther you get, the crazier the course!

Zombie's Got a Pogo new features:

• 6 death defying zombies to jump with.
• 17 unheard-of pogos. Frog pogo, oven pogo, sword pogo, ...
• A pile of accessories, that zombies like to wear.
• Zombie opponents trying to take you down.
• Powerups for smashing fun.
• Earn prizes as you complete goals.
• HD resolution and awesome audio.
